changeSet.sql: create table if not exists medicine_donation ( id bigint auto_increment primary key, active tinyint(1) default 1 null, title varchar(100) null, description varchar(500) null, image_url varchar(2048) null, donation_date datetime null, donation_expiration_date datetime null, status varchar(50) null, category varchar(50) null, communication_method varchar(50) null, medicine_id bigint null, quantity int null, medicine_unit_id bigint null, medicine_expiration_date datetime null, user_id bigint null, city_id bigint null, constraint medicine_donation_medicine_id_fk foreign key (medicine_id) references medicine (id), constraint medicine_donation_medicine_unit_id_fk foreign key (medicine_unit_id) references medicine_unit (id), constraint medicine_donation_user_id_fk foreign key (user_id) references user (id), constraint medicine_donation_city_id_fk foreign key (city_id) references city (id) );
